name: The Cycle (itch) (Rubikow)
description:
The game was created as an entry to the narrative-driven-jam-7 and - of course - does not contain even half of the content we planned for it. However we are planning on updating the game after the Jam ends.

Voice Acting is already half way implemented. After the jam, there will be an updated version.

Programming and Art

Rubikow

Story

Jaco van Hemert

Music composed by

Charlotte McMillan (Website)

Voice Acting

BigBug & Froschkoenigin
